official_title: A Multicenter, Low-Interventional Study to Evaluate the Feasibility of a Prospective Clinicogenomic Program
inclusion_criteria:
* Documented diagnosis of mNSCLC or ES-SCLC
* Planned initiation of SOC systemic anti-cancer treatment
* Front-Line Immunotherapy Cohort: Received front-line treatment of an immune blockade therapy including anti-CTLA-4, anti-PD-1, or anti-PD-L1 therapeutic antibody on Protocol GX41563
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria: - Participant actively receiving investigational medicinal product(s) as part of an interventional trial at the time of signing informed consent
